translated.Drag and drop into map: Arrastra y suelta dentro del mapa
translated.I Agree to the Terms of Service: Estoy de acuerdo con los Términos del Servicio
translated.NAME: NOMBRE
translated.Problem Loading Terms of Service: Problemas Cargando los Términos del Servicio

untranslated.Add a farm event via the + button to sch: Add a farm event via the + button to schedule a sequence or regimen in the calendar.
untranslated.Add plant at current FarmBot location {{: Add plant at current FarmBot location {{coordinate}}
untranslated.Add plants by pressing the + button and: Add plants by pressing the + button and searching for a plant, selecting one, and dragging it into the garden.
untranslated.Add sensors here to monitor FarmBot's se: Add sensors here to monitor FarmBot's sensors. To edit and create new sensors, press the EDIT button.
untranslated.Add sequences to your regimen by selecti: Add sequences to your regimen by selecting a sequence from the drop down, specifying a time, choosing which days it should run on, and then clicking the + button. For example: a Seeding sequence might be scheduled for Day 1, while a Watering sequence would be scheduled to run every other day.
untranslated.Add the newly created tools to the corre: Add the newly created tools to the corresponding toolbay slots on FarmBot: press edit and then + to create a toolbay slot.
untranslated.All items scheduled before the start tim: All items scheduled before the start time. Nothing to run.
untranslated.Amount of time to wait for a command to: Amount of time to wait for a command to execute before stopping.
untranslated.App could not be fully loaded, we recomm: App could not be fully loaded, we recommend you try refreshing the page.
untranslated.Arduino is possibly unplugged. Check the: Arduino is possibly unplugged. Check the USB cable between the Raspberry Pi and the Arduino. Reboot FarmBot after a reconnection. If the issue persists, reconfiguration of FarmBot OS may be necessary.
untranslated.Are they in use by sequences?: Are they in use by sequences?
untranslated.Are you sure you want to delete all item: Are you sure you want to delete all items?
untranslated.Are you sure you want to delete this fir: Are you sure you want to delete this first party farmware? Doing so will limit the functionality of your FarmBot and may cause unexpected behavior.
untranslated.Are you sure you want to delete this ite: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
untranslated.Are you sure you want to delete this ste: Are you sure you want to delete this step?
untranslated.Are you sure you want to unlock the devi: Are you sure you want to unlock the device?
untranslated.Assign a sequence to execute when a Rasp: Assign a sequence to execute when a Raspberry Pi GPIO pin is activated.
untranslated.Attempting to reconnect to the message b: Attempting to reconnect to the message broker
untranslated.Author: Author
untranslated.Automatically factory reset when the WiF: Automatically factory reset when the WiFi network cannot be detected. Useful for network changes.
untranslated.Before logging in, you must agree to our: Before logging in, you must agree to our latest Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
untranslated.Calibrate FarmBot's camera for use in th: Calibrate FarmBot's camera for use in the weed detection software.
untranslated.Cannot change from a Regimen to a Sequen: Cannot change from a Regimen to a Sequence.
untranslated.Change settings of your FarmBot hardware: Change settings of your FarmBot hardware with the fields below. Caution: Changing these settings to extreme values can cause hardware malfunction. Make sure to test any new settings before letting your FarmBot use them unsupervised. Tip: Recalibrate FarmBot after changing settings and test a few sequences to verify that everything works as expected.
untranslated.Change the account FarmBot is connected: Change the account FarmBot is connected to.
untranslated.Change the Farm Designer map size based: Change the Farm Designer map size based on axis length. A value must be input in AXIS LENGTH and STOP AT MAX must be enabled in the HARDWARE widget.
untranslated.Click a spot in the grid to choose a loc: Click a spot in the grid to choose a location. Once selected, press button to move FarmBot to this position. Press the back arrow to exit.
untranslated.Click and drag to draw a point or use th: Click and drag to draw a point or use the inputs and press update. Press CREATE POINT to save, or the back arrow to exit.
untranslated.Click one in the Regimens panel to edit,: Click one in the Regimens panel to edit, or click "+" to create a new one.
untranslated.Click one in the Sequences panel to edit: Click one in the Sequences panel to edit, or click "+" to create a new one.
untranslated.Click the edit button to add or edit a f: Click the edit button to add or edit a feed URL.
untranslated.Could not download FarmBot OS update inf: Could not download FarmBot OS update information.
untranslated.Create new gardens from scratch or by co: Create new gardens from scratch or by copying plants from the current garden. View and edit saved gardens, and, when ready, apply them to the main garden.
untranslated.Delete all of the points created through: Delete all of the points created through this panel.
untranslated.Delete all the points you have created?: Delete all the points you have created?
untranslated.Detect weeds using FarmBot's camera and: Detect weeds using FarmBot's camera and display them on the Farm Designer map.
untranslated.Diagnose connectivity issues with FarmBo: Diagnose connectivity issues with FarmBot and the browser.
untranslated.Display a virtual trail for FarmBot in t: Display a virtual trail for FarmBot in the Farm Designer map to show movement and watering history while the map is open. Toggling this setting will clear data for the current trail.
untranslated.Don't allow movement past the maximum va: Don't allow movement past the maximum value provided in AXIS LENGTH.
untranslated.Don't ask about saving work before closi: Don't ask about saving work before closing browser tab. Warning: may cause loss of data.
untranslated.Double the default dimensions of the Far: Double the default dimensions of the Farm Designer map for a map with four times the area.
untranslated.Drag a box around the plants you would l: Drag a box around the plants you would like to select. Press the back arrow to exit.
untranslated.Emergency stop if movement is not comple: Emergency stop if movement is not complete after the maximum number of retries.
untranslated.Enable plant animations in the Farm Desi: Enable plant animations in the Farm Designer.
untranslated.Enable use of a second x-axis motor. Con: Enable use of a second x-axis motor. Connects to E0 on RAMPS.
untranslated.Enable use of electronic end-stops durin: Enable use of electronic end-stops during calibration and homing.
untranslated.Enable use of rotary encoders during cal: Enable use of rotary encoders during calibration and homing.
End date must not be before start date.
End time must be after start time.
untranslated.Execute a sequence if a condition is sat: Execute a sequence if a condition is satisfied. If the condition is not satisfied, chose to do nothing or execute a different sequence.
Export all data related to this device. Exports are delivered via email as JSON.
untranslated.Export request received. Please allow up: Export request received. Please allow up to 10 minutes for delivery.
untranslated.Factory resetting your FarmBot will dest: Factory resetting your FarmBot will destroy all data on the device, revoking your FarmBot's ability to connect to your web app account and your home wifi. Upon factory resetting, your device will restart into Configurator mode. Factory resetting your FarmBot will not affect any data or settings from your web app account, allowing you to do a complete restore to your device once it is back online and paired with your web app account.
untranslated.FarmBot and the browser are both connect: FarmBot and the browser are both connected to the internet (or have been recently). Try rebooting FarmBot and refreshing the browser. If the issue persists, something may be preventing FarmBot from accessing the message broker (used to communicate with your web browser in real-time). If you are on a company or school network, a firewall may be blocking port 5672.
untranslated.FarmBot and the browser both have intern: FarmBot and the browser both have internet connectivity, but we haven't seen any activity from FarmBot on the Web App in a while. This could mean that FarmBot has not synced in a while, which might not be a problem. If you are experiencing usability issues, however, it could be a sign of HTTP blockage on FarmBot's local internet connection.
untranslated.FarmBot sent a malformed message. You ma: FarmBot sent a malformed message. You may need to upgrade FarmBot OS. Please upgrade FarmBot OS and log back in.
untranslated.FarmEvent start time needs to be in the: FarmEvent start time needs to be in the future, not the past.
untranslated.Have the browser also read aloud log mes: Have the browser also read aloud log messages on the "Speak" channel that are spoken by FarmBot.
untranslated.Here is the list of all of your sequence: Here is the list of all of your sequences. Click one to edit.
untranslated.Home position adjustment travel speed (h: Home position adjustment travel speed (homing and calibration) in motor steps per second.
untranslated.If encoders or end-stops are enabled, fi: If encoders or end-stops are enabled, find the home position when the device powers on. Warning! This will perform homing on all axes when the device powers on. Encoders or endstops must be enabled. It is recommended to make sure homing works properly before enabling this feature.
untranslated.If encoders or end-stops are enabled, ho: If encoders or end-stops are enabled, home axis (find zero).
If encoders or end-stops are enabled, home axis and determine maximum.
untranslated.If not using a webcam, use this setting: If not using a webcam, use this setting to remove the widget from the Controls page.
untranslated.If you are sure you want to delete your: If you are sure you want to delete your account, type in your password below to continue.
untranslated.If you have a webcam, you can view the v: If you have a webcam, you can view the video stream in this widget. Press the edit button to update and save your webcam URL.
Input is not needed for this Farmware.
Invalid Raspberry Pi GPIO pin number.
untranslated.Invert axis end-stops. Enable for normal: Invert axis end-stops. Enable for normally closed (NC), disable for normally open (NO).
untranslated.Invert direction of motor during calibra: Invert direction of motor during calibration.
untranslated.Keep power applied to motors. Prevents s: Keep power applied to motors. Prevents slipping from gravity in certain situations.
untranslated.Log all commands sent to firmware (clear: Log all commands sent to firmware (clears after refresh).
untranslated.Log all debug received from firmware (cl: Log all debug received from firmware (clears after refresh).
untranslated.Log all responses received from firmware: Log all responses received from firmware (clears after refresh). Warning: extremely verbose.
untranslated.Maximum travel speed after acceleration: Maximum travel speed after acceleration in motor steps per second.
untranslated.Minimum movement speed in motor steps pe: Minimum movement speed in motor steps per second. Also used for homing and calibration.
untranslated.Must be a positive number. Rounding up t: Must be a positive number. Rounding up to 0.
untranslated.name: name
untranslated.Name: Name
untranslated.New password and confirmation do not mat: New password and confirmation do not match.
untranslated.No logs to display. Visit Logs page to v: No logs to display. Visit Logs page to view filters.
untranslated.No webcams yet. Click the edit button to: No webcams yet. Click the edit button to add a feed URL.
Not available when device is offline.
untranslated.Note: The selected timezone for your Far: Note: The selected timezone for your FarmBot is different than your local browser time.
untranslated.Note: Times displayed according to FarmB: Note: Times displayed according to FarmBot's local time, which is currently different from your browser's time. Timezone data is configurable on the Device page).
untranslated.Number of steps missed (determined by en: Number of steps missed (determined by encoder) before motor is considered to have stalled.
untranslated.Number of steps used for acceleration an: Number of steps used for acceleration and deceleration.
untranslated.Number of times to retry a movement befo: Number of times to retry a movement before stopping.
untranslated.Open OpenFarm.cc in a new tab: Open OpenFarm.cc in a new tab
untranslated.Or view FarmBot's current location in th: Or view FarmBot's current location in the virtual garden.
untranslated.Outside of planting area. Plants must be: Outside of planting area. Plants must be placed within the grid.
untranslated.Pin numbers are required and must be pos: Pin numbers are required and must be positive and unique.
Pin numbers must be less than 1000.
untranslated.Please check your email for the verifica: Please check your email for the verification link.
untranslated.Please check your email to confirm email: Please check your email to confirm email address changes
Please select a sequence or action.
untranslated.Press \"+\" to add a plant to your garde: Press "+" to add a plant to your garden.
untranslated.Press edit and then the + button to add: Press edit and then the + button to add peripherals.
Press edit and then the + button to add tools.
untranslated.Press the + button and add your newly cr: Press the + button and add your newly created sequences to a regimen via the scheduler. The regimen should include all actions needed to take care of a plant over its life.
untranslated.Processing now. Results usually availabl: Processing now. Results usually available in one minute.
untranslated.Provided new and old passwords match. Pa: Provided new and old passwords match. Password not changed.
untranslated.Raspberry Pi GPIO pin already bound or i: Raspberry Pi GPIO pin already bound or in use.
untranslated.Reduction to missed step total for every: Reduction to missed step total for every good step.
untranslated.Regimens allow FarmBot to take care of a: Regimens allow FarmBot to take care of a plant throughout its entire life. A regimen consists of many sequences that are scheduled to run based on the age of the plant. Regimens are applied to plants from the farm designer (coming soon) and can be re-used on many plants growing at the same or different times. Multiple regimens can be applied to any one plant.
untranslated.Reserved Raspberry Pi pin may not work a: Reserved Raspberry Pi pin may not work as expected.
untranslated.Restart the Farmduino or Arduino firmwar: Restart the Farmduino or Arduino firmware.
untranslated.Restoring hardware parameter defaults wi: Restoring hardware parameter defaults will destroy the current settings, resetting them to default values.
untranslated.Restrict travel to negative coordinate l: Restrict travel to negative coordinate locations. Overridden by disabling STOP AT HOME.
untranslated.Reverse the direction of encoder positio: Reverse the direction of encoder position reading.
untranslated.Save sequence and sync device before run: Save sequence and sync device before running.
untranslated.Save snapshot of FarmBot OS system infor: Save snapshot of FarmBot OS system information, including user and device identity, to the database. A code will be returned that you can provide in support requests to allow FarmBot to look up data relevant to the issue to help us identify the problem.
Search for a crop to add to your garden.
Select a regimen first or create one.
untranslated.Select a sequence from the dropdown firs: Select a sequence from the dropdown first.
untranslated.Send a log message for each sequence ste: Send a log message for each sequence step.
untranslated.Send a log message upon the end of seque: Send a log message upon the end of sequence execution.
untranslated.Send a log message upon the start of seq: Send a log message upon the start of sequence execution.
Set the current location as zero.
untranslated.Set the length of each axis to provide s: Set the length of each axis to provide software limits. Used only if STOP AT MAX is enabled.
untranslated.Setup, customize, and control FarmBot fr: Setup, customize, and control FarmBot from your
untranslated.Show a confirmation dialog when the sequ: Show a confirmation dialog when the sequence delete step icon is pressed.
untranslated.Snaps a photo using the device camera. S: Snaps a photo using the device camera. Select the camera type on the Device page.
untranslated.Some other issue is preventing FarmBot f: Some other issue is preventing FarmBot from working. Please see the table above for more information.
untranslated.Something went wrong while rendering thi: Something went wrong while rendering this page.
Stop at the home location of the axis.
Swap axis minimum and maximum end-stops.
Take a guided tour of the Web App.
untranslated.Take and view photos with your FarmBot's: Take and view photos with your FarmBot's camera.
untranslated.The device has never been seen. Most lik: The device has never been seen. Most likely, there is a network connectivity issue on the device's end.
untranslated.The Farmware will use the parameter valu: The Farmware will use the parameter values set via the Farmware page for any parameters that are not set in this sequence step.
untranslated.The Find Home step instructs the device: The Find Home step instructs the device to perform a homing command to find and set zero for the chosen axis or axes.
untranslated.The Mark As step allows FarmBot to progr: The Mark As step allows FarmBot to programmatically edit the properties of the UTM, plants, and weeds from within a sequence. For example, you can mark a plant as "planted" during a seeding sequence or delete a weed after removing it.
untranslated.The Move Absolute step instructs FarmBot: The Move Absolute step instructs FarmBot to move to the specified coordinate regardless of the current position. For example, if FarmBot is currently at X=1000, Y=1000 and it receives a Move Absolute where X=0 and Y=3000, then FarmBot will move to X=0, Y=3000. If FarmBot must move in multiple directions, it will move diagonally. If you require straight movements along one axis at a time, use multiple Move Absolute steps. Offsets allow you to more easily instruct FarmBot to move to a location, but offset from it by the specified amount. For example moving to just above where a peripheral is located. Using offsets lets FarmBot do the math for you.
untranslated.The Move Relative step instructs FarmBot: The Move Relative step instructs FarmBot to move the specified distance from its current location. For example, if FarmBot is currently at X=1000, Y=1000 and it receives a Move Relative where X=0 and Y=3000, then FarmBot will move to X=1000, Y=4000. If FarmBot must move in multiple directions, it will move diagonally. If you require straight movements along one axis at a time, use multiple Move Relative steps. Move Relative steps should be preceded by a Move Absolute step to ensure you are starting from a known location.
untranslated.The next item in this Farm Event will ru: The next item in this Farm Event will run {{timeFromNow}}, but you must first SYNC YOUR DEVICE. If you do not sync, the event will not run.
The next item in this Farm Event will run {{timeFromNow}}.
untranslated.The number of motor steps required to mo: The number of motor steps required to move the axis one millimeter.
untranslated.The number of the pin to guard. This pin: The number of the pin to guard. This pin will be set to the specified state after the duration specified by TIMEOUT.
untranslated.The Read Pin step instructs FarmBot to r: The Read Pin step instructs FarmBot to read the current value of the specified pin. Pin Mode: Use digital for a 0 (LOW) or 1 (HIGH) response, and analog for a voltage reading (0-1023 for 0-5V).
untranslated.The Run Farmware step runs a Farmware pa: The Run Farmware step runs a Farmware package. Visit the Farmware page to install and manage Farmware.
untranslated.The terms of service have recently chang: The terms of service have recently changed. You must accept the new terms of service to continue using the site.
untranslated.The Wait step instructs FarmBot to wait: The Wait step instructs FarmBot to wait for the specified amount of time. Use it in combination with the Pin Write step to water for a length of time.
untranslated.The Write Pin step instructs FarmBot to: The Write Pin step instructs FarmBot to set the specified pin on the Arduino to the specified mode and value. Use the digital pin mode for on (1) and off (0) control, and analog pin mode for PWM (pulse width modulation) (0-255).
untranslated.There is no access to FarmBot or the mes: There is no access to FarmBot or the message broker. This is usually caused by outdated browsers (Internet Explorer) or firewalls that block WebSockets on port 3002.
untranslated.These are the most basic commands FarmBo: These are the most basic commands FarmBot can execute. Drag and drop them to create sequences for watering, planting seeds, measuring soil properties, and more.
untranslated.This account did not have a timezone set: This account did not have a timezone set. FarmBot requires a timezone to operate. We have updated your timezone settings based on your browser. Please verify these settings in the device settings panel. Device sync is recommended.
untranslated.This command will not execute correctly: This command will not execute correctly because you do not have encoders or endstops enabled for the chosen axis. Enable endstops or encoders from the Device page for:
untranslated.This Farm Event does not appear to have: This Farm Event does not appear to have a valid run time. Perhaps you entered bad dates?
This is a list of all of your regimens. Click one to begin editing it.
untranslated.This is a list of all your FarmBot Tools: This is a list of all your FarmBot Tools. Click the Edit button to add, edit, or delete tools.
untranslated.This will restart FarmBot's Raspberry Pi: This will restart FarmBot's Raspberry Pi and controller software.
untranslated.This will shutdown FarmBot's Raspberry P: This will shutdown FarmBot's Raspberry Pi. To turn it back on, unplug FarmBot and plug it back in.
untranslated.Time in minutes to attempt connecting to: Time in minutes to attempt connecting to WiFi before a factory reset.
untranslated.to add the plant to the map. You can add: to add the plant to the map. You can add the plant as many times as you need to before pressing DONE to finish.
untranslated.Toggle various settings to customize you: Toggle various settings to customize your web app experience.
untranslated.Toolbays are where you store your FarmBo: Toolbays are where you store your FarmBot Tools. Each Toolbay has Slots that you can put your Tools in, which should be reflective of your real FarmBot hardware configuration.
Turn off to set Web App to English.
Unable to properly display this step.
untranslated.Unable to resend verification email. Are: Unable to resend verification email. Are you already verified?
untranslated.Unexpected error occurred, we've been no: Unexpected error occurred, we've been notified of the problem.
untranslated.Upon successful password change, your Fa: Upon successful password change, your FarmBot will factory reset allowing you to configure it with the updated credentials. You will also be logged out of other browser sessions. Continue?
untranslated.Use these manual control buttons to move: Use these manual control buttons to move FarmBot in realtime. Press the arrows for relative movements or type in new coordinates and press GO for an absolute movement. Tip: Press the Home button when you are done so FarmBot is ready to get back to work.
untranslated.Use these toggle switches to control Far: Use these toggle switches to control FarmBot's peripherals in realtime. To edit and create new peripherals, press the EDIT button. Make sure to turn things off when you're done!
untranslated.Used in another resource. Protected from: Used in another resource. Protected from deletion.
untranslated.Value must be greater than or equal to {: Value must be greater than or equal to {{min}}.
untranslated.Value must be less than or equal to {{ma: Value must be less than or equal to {{max}}.
untranslated.Verification email resent. Please check: Verification email resent. Please check your email!
untranslated.View and filter historical sensor readin: View and filter historical sensor reading data.
untranslated.View FarmBot's current location using th: View FarmBot's current location using the axis position display.
View photos your FarmBot has taken here.
untranslated.View recent log messages here. More deta: View recent log messages here. More detailed log messages can be shown by adjusting filter settings.
View, select, and install new Farmware.
untranslated.Warning: Binding to a pin without a phys: Warning: Binding to a pin without a physical button and pull-down resistor connected may put FarmBot into an unstable state.
untranslated.Warning: FarmBot could not guess your ti: Warning: FarmBot could not guess your timezone. We have defaulted your timezone to UTC, which is less than ideal for most users. Please select your timezone from the dropdown. Device sync is recommended.
untranslated.Warning: This will erase all data stored: Warning: This will erase all data stored on your FarmBot's SD card, requiring you to reconfigure FarmBot so that it can reconnect to your WiFi network and a web app account. Factory resetting the device will not delete data stored in your web app account. Are you sure you wish to continue?
untranslated.Warning: This will reset all hardware se: Warning: This will reset all hardware settings to the default values. Are you sure you wish to continue?
untranslated.WARNING! Deleting your account will perm: WARNING! Deleting your account will permanently delete all of your Sequences, Regimens, Events, and Farm Designer data. Upon deleting your account, FarmBot will cease to function and become inaccessible until it is paired with another web app account. To do this, you will need to reboot your FarmBot so that is goes back into configuration mode for pairing with another user account. When this happens, all of the data on your FarmBot will be overwritten with the new account's data. If the account is brand new, then FarmBot will become a blank slate.
untranslated.Warning! Opting in to FarmBot OS beta re: Warning! Opting in to FarmBot OS beta releases may reduce FarmBot system stability. Are you sure?
untranslated.Warning! This is an EXPERIMENTAL feature: Warning! This is an EXPERIMENTAL feature. This feature may be broken and may break or otherwise hinder your usage of the rest of the app. This feature may disappear or break at any time.
untranslated.Warning! When enabled, any unsaved chang: Warning! When enabled, any unsaved changes will be discarded when refreshing or closing the page. Are you sure?
untranslated.What do you need help with?: What do you need help with?
untranslated.What do you want to grow?: What do you want to grow?
untranslated.When enabled, device resources such as s: When enabled, device resources such as sequences and regimens will be sent to the device automatically. This removes the need to push "SYNC" after making changes in the web app. Changes to running sequences and regimens while auto sync is enabled will result in instantaneous change.
untranslated.When enabled, FarmBot OS will periodical: When enabled, FarmBot OS will periodically check for, download, and install updates automatically.
untranslated.You are either offline, using a web brow: You are either offline, using a web browser that does not support WebSockets, or are behind a firewall that blocks port 3002. Do not attempt to debug FarmBot hardware until you solve this issue first. You will not be able to troubleshoot hardware issues without a reliable browser and internet connection.
untranslated.You are running an old version of FarmBo: You are running an old version of FarmBot OS.
untranslated.You are scheduling a regimen to run toda: You are scheduling a regimen to run today. Be aware that running a regimen too late in the day may result in skipped regimen tasks. Consider rescheduling this event to tomorrow if this is a concern.
untranslated.You haven't made any regimens or sequenc: You haven't made any regimens or sequences yet. Please create a
untranslated.You haven't yet taken any photos with yo: You haven't yet taken any photos with your FarmBot. Once you do, they will show up here.
untranslated.You may click the button below to resend: You may click the button below to resend the email.
untranslated.You must set a timezone before using the: You must set a timezone before using the FarmEvent feature.
untranslated.Your browser is connected correctly, but: Your browser is connected correctly, but we have no recent record of FarmBot connecting to the internet. This usually happens because of a bad WiFi signal in the garden, a bad password during configuration, or a very long power outage.
untranslated.Your version of FarmBot OS is outdated a: Your version of FarmBot OS is outdated and will soon no longer be supported. Please update your device as soon as possible.
untranslated.Your web browser is unable to communicat: Your web browser is unable to communicate with the web app server. Make sure you are connected to the Internet.
